Articles.Content:
I seem to be having a bit of a problem getting the Rotation Axis Bindings to work in Docking Mode. I have a Logitec Extreme3Dpro, works great btw, best 29.99 Ive ever spent.

I have no problems with the actual joystick bindings while in Staging Mode. I have the push forward and pull backward on the joystick set to the pitch and the pull left and pull right set to roll and I use the joysticks twist feature too yaw. Simple enough.

I would like to set up a similar combination to the Rotation Axis Bindings for the Docking Mode yet I would like certain axis inverted to suit my piloting style. Hence, the main purpose of even having a Docking Mode option.

So when I get set and ready to make my orbital rendezvous, I hit the little docking button, it lights up white to indicate I am in that mode yet none of the Rotation Axis Bindings I have mapped to my joystick respond. Am I missing something here?
Docking mode switches between, rotation and translation modes with the spacebar. I think you can't have both at the same time in docking mode

I was not aware of that. I will experiment with what I have learned here and report back with my findings. You have my thanks

Edited January 2, 2014 by skidkidd
Yes, that solved the issue i was having. Would be great If I could operate both during Docking mode...Many thanks
you can. if you are in staging mode the rotation keys WASDQE will rotate your craft while IJKLHN will translate your craft.
